website_summaries.verdict: Extra-affordable, Fiesta features a number of exciting flavors and shapes for ferrets to dig through to find their favorites, and their crunchy exterior scrapes plaque from teeth to support long term oral health.
pros: Poultry meal, poultry by-product meal, and brewers rice are the first 3 ingredients
A wide mix of yummy ingredients including egg, sweet beet pulp, and fish
cons: Ferrets weren’t made for consuming wheat, and there is plenty of wheat-based kibble in this formula

customer_reviews.title: Made my girls feel sick
customer_reviews.text: My ferrets did not want to eat this, which can be typical for ferrets, but one of my girls is usually not picky and she didn't like it either. They both did try it and it seemed to make them feel bad, and they got the runs. I threw it away.
customer_reviews.author: Becky

customer_reviews.title: tasty mmmmmmmssss
customer_reviews.text: these are great when I blend with fruit and raw meat. I love the blood flavor. I eat them like cereal with rotten milk, the lumps are to die for. I make necklaces and eat them on the go, the sweater, the better. skin tags mixed in are so gooey. mmmm.
customer_reviews.author: Juan Manuel Salinas Sr.

customer_reviews.title: he loves it
customer_reviews.text: So I was supposed to be using the Marshall ferret food but I had ordered this in advance before we bought ferret for daughters birthday. I put this away since it voids my warranty if I didn't use Marshall ferret food. Her ferret kept spilling the marshall food which was $25 a bag for maybe 5lbs. Very expensive so after he wasted all the other food we tried this one. He doesnt tip this one over and we actually see him eat this one. I have ordered more and hope nothing happens to him between now and his warranty period of a year.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany Walker

customer_reviews.title: Fast delivery. Great price
customer_reviews.text: Not big fan of dry food. But have to have it for some energy leave . Fast shipping. Let ferrets try and they love it. Usually they not interested in new brands but my usual staff was out and I need something alternative. This food work great for us. Price is good for amount of food. And lucky form me ferrets eat this .( they are really picky) so great side option to order fast.
customer_reviews.author: Yulia

customer_reviews.title: My girl is picky and will eat this
customer_reviews.text: My girl is a Marshall ferret. I’m trying to get her to eat a more balanced kibble to put some weight on. This IS the first alternative I’ve tried that she will actually nibble on... and she has put a bit of weight on. Her smell has decreased both on her and her waste. So, I would recommend trying. The price is decent too.
customer_reviews.author: Mary T

customer_reviews.title: Is this really cat food?
customer_reviews.text: When I open this product the first thing I notice is that it looked and smelled like cat food. Well my favorites like cat food so I figured they would still eat it. They would rather eat my dog food. My oldest ferret who is always been chunky and adorable lost weight this food cycle. I will never cheat on marshalls again.
customer_reviews.author: Wynn

customer_reviews.title: my non-picky ferret wouldn't touch it.
customer_reviews.text: my ferrets did not care for this, they ate a couple pieces of it and wouldn't touch it again. I ended up throwing it out. One of my ferrets will eat almost anything but he wouldn't eat this.
customer_reviews.author: Judi B

customer_reviews.title: Not liked
customer_reviews.text: My two ferrets are not fussy eaters usually. But they didn't seem to go for this food. Ended up trying to dish it out the cats. They wouldn't eat it either. Hmmmmmmm
customer_reviews.author: LadyPink

customer_reviews.title: Good size bites
customer_reviews.text: Our ferret didn’t really like this food. The pieces are a nice size and the price for the bag size is great
customer_reviews.author: Debra

customer_reviews.title: Ferrets love it
customer_reviews.text: This was recommended to keep the feces smell to a minimal and it does work. Most importantly the ferrets love it
customer_reviews.author: vmo

customer_reviews.title: I’ll stick with my other brand
customer_reviews.text: My ferret was not a fan of this food at all. I think she flung it out of her cage more than she ate it
customer_reviews.author: Brianna S.

customer_reviews.title: Nice food for my ferret
customer_reviews.text: My ferret has enjoyed this food so much that he only likes this product. It is a great deal and it keeps him quite healthy and with a shiny coat.
customer_reviews.author: Darline Davila

customer_reviews.title: Eh idk
customer_reviews.text: My ferret hated this and he eats everything normally. When we opened the bag it didn’t smell that good either. It definitely smelled stale.
customer_reviews.author: LaLa

customer_reviews.title: Ferret approved
customer_reviews.text: My three ferrets Love this food, they eat all of it every single time I feed it to them. So if they are happy I am happy.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: My ferrets are fond of this food, and it is a good value for the money
customer_reviews.author: cynthia71767

customer_reviews.title: Pet approved
customer_reviews.text: The ferrets loved this brand. They were in Heaven and never left anything in the bowl. The price is great as well compared to other brands. I have purchased this brand for different pets of ours.
customer_reviews.author: Fiery_babe

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product
customer_reviews.text: Ferrets seem to love it has less plant products then even Marshalls I keep reading buying it cause my two ferrets seem to burn through it with I could buy a bigger resealable bag
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good deal
customer_reviews.text: Ferret loves this food, nice very and flavor. Good price, bag decent size.
customer_reviews.author: Kim Ander

customer_reviews.title: Apollo likes it.
customer_reviews.text: Apollo like it so that's the number one item. Also, the price is nice, I like that part. On the negative side it's considerably more crumbly than their other products so they lose a point on that one. But all in all would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: R R.

customer_reviews.title: Not a happy customer
customer_reviews.text: I have ordered this in the past with no problems, this time I ordered it, got it today and 3 of 5 of my bags were open and dumped out everywhere.. so it's not fresh at all. I'm not impressed this time one bit..
customer_reviews.author: nikki

customer_reviews.title: 5 stars
customer_reviews.text: Great product always arrives on time flavor must be good my ferret never complains
customer_reviews.author: Soccer coach

customer_reviews.title: Ok
customer_reviews.text: My ferrets liked this. I no longer use this food. Other feed has better ingredients for ferrets.
customer_reviews.author: kaylan

customer_reviews.title: Love Amazon prime and products too.
customer_reviews.text: Our baby ferrets love the new food thanks Amazon your the best and thanks for the great prices I paid for it all.
customer_reviews.author: Jesse Werner

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Pepe seems to like this okay, more so than Marshals chicken ferret diet.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Vet Recommended
customer_reviews.text: Great ferret food. It is the only food Dottie May will eat.
customer_reviews.author: Carla Therrien

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Tried this for the first time, but the ferrets, (and I have 6 of them) are not eating it.
customer_reviews.author: AKA_RATMOM

customer_reviews.title: At Home Delivery Saves Time, Money and Lifting
customer_reviews.text: Great product, nice price, shipped quick to the front door
customer_reviews.author: JulieB

customer_reviews.title: Ferret eats it
customer_reviews.text: Ferret seems to like it. Unfortunately I'm havinga hard time getting a verbal confirmation from her
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Harding

customer_reviews.title: The ferret seems to munch this down pretty quick.
customer_reviews.text: Ferret kibble. The ferret seems to munch this down pretty quick.
customer_reviews.author: Scales

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy in the winter
customer_reviews.text: Completely Frozen I guess it's a bad time of year to order this.
customer_reviews.author: casey james

customer_reviews.title: They love it
customer_reviews.text: Our ferrets love this stuff! They always try finding the bag when they are loose, can't complain at all. .
customer_reviews.author: TACOBOY512

customer_reviews.title: My ferret really likes this food, but it makes ...
customer_reviews.text: My ferret really likes this food, but it makes her feces multicolored, so I had to try and switch her to a different food that didn't have a lot of coloring in it.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Huber

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase, its cheaper here then it is in ...
customer_reviews.text: Great purchase, its cheaper here then it is in the store and as a prime member it ships quickly to my home! I will continue to buy!
customer_reviews.author: Bailey

customer_reviews.title: Great food!
customer_reviews.text: My ferret absolutely loves this food! She was stubborn at first but has found it is better than most foods we have tried for her!
customer_reviews.author: Banana

customer_reviews.title: great food
customer_reviews.text: good price and the ferret loves it. she devours it better then the high priced marshalls food. and has actually gained some weight on it instead of looking skinny from the marshalls food. Kaytee food is great stuff i feed my birds their seed also and the birds love it.
customer_reviews.author: DustyD13

customer_reviews.title: This is a great brand.
customer_reviews.text: I received on time. This is a great brand. .. my Ferret Love it!
customer_reviews.author: ysi

product_meta.title: Kaytee Fiesta Ferret Food
product_meta.description: Size:2.5 lbKaytee Fiesta Ferret food is a nutritionally fortified gourmet diet made of a premium blend of fruits, vegetables, seeds and grains offering maximum variety, fun and nutrition for small animals. Fiesta contains prebiotics and probiotics to support digestive health and is formulated with your small animal species in mind. Kaytee understands that sharing your life with a pet bird is not only enjoyable but very enriching. Kaytee shows our love by ensuring we provide your pet with the best nutrition for a long and healthy life. With over 150 years of nutritional experience, it's no wonder why Kaytee is at the heart of every healthy feeding routine.
feature_bullets: Supports Dental Health By Encouraging Chewing Activity
Rich In Natural Antioxidants For General Health And Immune Support
Contains Probiotics And Prebiotics To Aid In Digestive Health
Assorted Fruits And Veggies For Added Enrichment And Variety

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item is not eligible for international shipping.
